Blacksmith Ivni:
If you need a Dual Swords contact Ivni! I can do anything other than swords grade A! Only beats me ... Perhaps only the legendary Blacksmith of Mammon?
If you bring a sword and a stone of purity as payment, it will be enough, and I will prepare you for the Dual Swords.
Simple weapons combined with simple weapons common combined with conventional, and only rare weapons and can be combined with a simple and with little arms. That's done Dual Swords. Rare weapons-grade below B in the world does not occur.
Swords with different abilities can not be combined, so they are useless.
Also remember that the modification of weapons after the unification disappears!
